sentences.english: Looking better can help you feel better.
sentences.chinese: 良好的儀容能使你感覺更好。

sentences.english: Report to work in uniform following all appearance standards.
sentences.chinese: 按照所有的儀容儀表標準着制服報到。

sentences.english: Adhere to specified hygiene and personal appearance standards.
sentences.chinese: 遵守規定的衛生和個人儀容標準。

sentences.english: She has been rather neglectful of her appearance lately.
sentences.chinese: 她最近不大重視自己的儀容。

sentences.english: Grooming and privgot hygiene haudio-videoe i've been around for matures.
sentences.chinese: 儀容整潔和個人衛生的講求已經行之有年了。

sentences.english: What tare the requirements for appearance in social communication occasions?
sentences.chinese: 社交場合的儀容要求是什麼？

sentences.english: Grooming and personal hygiene have been around for ages.
sentences.chinese: 儀容整潔和個人衛生的考究已經行之有年了。

sentences.english: Q6. What are the requirements for appearance in social communication occasions?
sentences.chinese: 社交場合的儀容要求是什麼？

sentences.english: Is but the seemly raiment of my heart.
sentences.chinese: 是我心衣飾的得體儀容。

definition: cultured and refined (idiom); gentle and cultivated
properly/satisfactorily/firmly/very fitting/appropriate/proper/to be in good order/also written 妥帖
to make a show of being original or unconventional (idiom)
the cool eye of a bystander/a detached point of view
lit. you hoodwink me and I cheat you (idiom); fig. mutual deception/each tries to outwit the other/dog eats dog and devil take the hindmost
untainted by even a speck of dust (idiom); selfless and incorruptible/spotless
